issue.title: [CF 896] "The DR category "shortroot" is undefined"

comments.body:
This particular error can be ignored if you don't use any of the Dr categories that are mentioned in the 3 different errors. To fix it, download and install the latest version from the files tab at the top of this page.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
